short_summary: An agreement to provide Residential facilities and program services to a mandate under the Correctional Service of Canada. The Group Respite Community is a extended day program for adults and seniors who experience distress and assessments for Health Facilities after each episode, Hastings Elementary School gets large interventions to decrease Depression. This contract includes all housing, meals and interventions covered under this RESIDENTIAL program
